column1: - Fixed issue with navmesh not baking correctly in first room of section 3. The issue seemed to relate to how static and dynamic objects group together when baking a navmesh. This may be worth remembering if it comes up again in the future.

- Added new 'reflection' effect to the floor in the section 3 kitchen minigame. This effect is created by rendering a mirrored version of the room underneath the floor. This essentially doubles the number of rendered polygons. However
column2: if the count is low enough this shouldn't be a problem. Will need to test performance on relative hardware.

column1: - The navmesh seems to break in the section 3 blockout. This only happens when the game starts and the navmesh is re-baked at the start of the game. When baked in editor the navmesh appears fine. May relate to player prefab? Could be fixed by re-importing. Need to look into this more.

column1: - Fixed issue where screen fade wasn't happening before camera transition. Someone changed the target alpha to zero which caused the transition to happen immediately.

column2: the blockout doesn't have any of the audio set up like in other levels. This causes a lot of null reference errors as the audio scripts can't be found. An additional check was added to make sure the audio variables were there before doing anything with them.
